title: Mia Khalifa
summary: Mia Khalifa (/miːə kəˈliːfə/; Arabic: مِيَا خَلِيفَة‎, romanized: Miyа̄ Ḵalīfah; born 1993)[1] is a Lebanese-American media personality,[2] webcam model, and former pornographic actress. She began acting in pornography in October 2014, becoming the most viewed performer on Pornhub in two months. Her career choice was met with controversy in the Middle East, especially for a video in which she performed sexual acts while wearing a hijab.
